text: Uyirullavarai Usha (Tamil: உயிருள்ளவரை உஷா; As long my life with Usha) is a 1983 Indian Tamil film, written and directed by Vijaya T. Rajendar and produced by Usha Rajendar. The film stars Vijaya T. Rajendar, Saritha, Ganga and Nalini in lead roles. The film had musical score by Vijaya T. Rajendar. The film was remade in Kannada as Premigala Saval and in Hindi as Aag Aur Shola. The film was dubbed in Telugu as Prema Sagaram. ==Cast== *Vijaya T.
